record.svcOptions: <form><select id="flrnum" label="Select a floor:" mandatory="true" style="combo" visible="true"><option label=""/><option id="1" label="1st Floor">1st Floor</option><option id="2" label="2nd Floor">2nd Floor</option><option id="3" label="3rd Floor">3rd Floor</option><option id="4" label="4th Floor">4th Floor</option><option id="5" label="5th Floor">5th Floor</option><option id="6" label="N/A">N/A</option></select><text id="direction" label="Provide additional directions to workstation (i.e. room 314, north side of building by women's restroom):" mandatory="true" multiline="true" visible="true"/><select id="item" label="Please select an item:" mandatory="true" style="combo" visible="true"><option label=""/><option label="Keyboard Tray">Keyboard Tray</option><option label="Pencil Drawer">Pencil Drawer</option><option label="Desk Light">Desk Light</option><option label="Swing Arm Light">Swing Arm Light</option><option label="Keys">Keys</option><option label="Boxes">Boxes</option><option label="Remove Reasonable Accommodation">Remove Reasonable Accommodation</option></select><select id="keytry" label="Keyboard Tray Action:" mandatory="[item]="Keyboard Tray"" style="combo" visible="[item]="Keyboard Tray""><option label=""/><option id="0" label="Add">Add</option><option id="1" label="Move">Move</option><option id="2" label="Remove">Remove</option></select><select id="peldrw" label="Pencil Drawer Action:" mandatory="[item]="Pencil Drawer"" style="combo" visible="[item]="Pencil Drawer""><option label=""/><option id="0" label="Add">Add</option><option id="1" label="Move">Move</option><option id="2" label="Remove">Remove</option></select><select id="dsklit" label="Desk Light Action:" mandatory="[item]="Desk Light"" style="combo" visible="[item]="Desk Light""><option label=""/><option id="0" label="Add">Add</option><option id="1" label="Move">Move</option><option id="2" label="Repair">Repair</option></select><select id="swnglit" label="Swing Arm Light Action:" mandatory="[item]="Swing Arm Light"" style="combo" visible="[item]="Swing Arm Light""><option label=""/><option id="0" label="Add">Add</option><option id="1" label="Move">Move</option><option id="2" label="Repair">Repair</option></select><select id="rmvrae" label="Remove Reasonable Accommodation Action:" mandatory="[item]="Remove Reasonable Accommodation"" style="combo" visible="[item]="Remove Reasonable Accommodation""><option label=""/><option id="0" label="Monitor Arms">Monitor Arms</option><option id="1" label="Keyboard Tray">Keyboard Tray</option><option id="2" label="Chair">Chair</option><option id="3" label="All">All</option><option id="4" label="Other">Other</option></select><text id="raothe" label="Please specify details for undefined remove reasonable accomodation action:" mandatory="[rmvrae]="Other"" multiline="true" visible="[rmvrae]="Other""/><text id="other" label="Please specify details for undefined workstation action:" mandatory="[item]="Other"" multiline="true" visible="[item]="Other""/></form>
